intro:
CYBERSLAYER is a high-intensity first-person action slasher that thrusts you into the pulse-pounding rhythm of a cyberpunk future. The game takes place in a vast metropolis where law and order have long collapsed, and humanity’s last refuge—a towering megastructure—has become a battleground for survival.

You play as a mysterious bounty hunter, a figure shrouded in legend. No one knows his true name, his past, or even how long he has been around. According to rumors, he was once a dedicated officer of the law, until a fateful conspiracy changed everything. Stripped of his family and left gravely wounded, he was given a second chance by an enigmatic doctor seeking a subject for groundbreaking cybernetic experiments.

Enhanced with cutting-edge implants and unparalleled combat abilities, he has taken on a new mission—to rid the city of those who spread chaos and fear. Though his methods may be unorthodox, his actions speak louder than words. While those in power hesitate, he takes action, determined to bring justice where none exists.

Prepare for over 15 dynamic and visually stunning levels, where every battle is a race against time. Your weaponry is limited to melee combat, but that doesn't mean the fight will be easy—you can wield your blade in close quarters or throw it at enemies, creating your own distinct combat style. Only those with speed, skill, and determination will prevail.

All of this unfolds to the beat of an electrifying cyberpunk soundtrack, immersing you in the neon-lit chaos of a city on the edge.

You are CYBERSLAYER. The future is in your hands.
